document.full_text: celtic and rangers will renew their ancient rivalry sunday in glasgow, days after the revelation that package bombs had been sent to several prominent celtic supporters and the celtic manager, neil lennon.
document.title: 'hopefully, all this rubbish can stop'
lines_and_colors: celtic and rangers will renew their ancient rivalry sunday in glasgow, days after the revelation that package bombs had been sent to several prominent celtic supporters and the celtic manager, neil lennon.
